articles.description: Here’s an exclusive look at the new Easy Day Academy high school level in skateboarding sim Skater XL.

articles.title: Potionomics has a publisher: Xseed Games - VentureBeat
articles.description: Potionomics is a blend of shop sim and RPG, and Xseed Games has signed developer Voracious Games to a publishing deal for it. It'll appear on PC, but they di...
